caption.p: Binding conformation and molecular interaction (compounds are represented as green sticks and key interacting residues are displayed in thin red wireframe representation) between SARS-CoV M pro lead compounds and. (A) Saquinavir (ZINC000026985532) (B) inhibitor SG85 (G85). The hydrophobic interactions are indicated by red arcs with radiating spikes and green dashed lines correspond to hydrogen bonds.
